players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
Bob: "I agree with Alice. Let's be vigilant and make sure we vote for the player who seems most suspicious to us."
Charlie: "Based on the information I have gathered, I believe Bob is the mafioso. Let's work together to vote him out and keep our town safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
